title: Readout of the Secretary-General’s meeting with H.R.H. Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, Crown Prince and Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia | Secretary-General | United Nations
snippet: The Secretary-General met with H.R.H. Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, Crown Prince and Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.The Secretary-General commended the long-standing UN-Saudi partnership and support to multilateralism. The Secretary-General and the Crown Prince also exchanged views on a range of regional developments and an analysis of the

title: Mohammed bin Salman - Wikipedia
snippet: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman hosted Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in Riyadh on 10 March 2025, ahead of U.S.-Ukraine talks.

title: Crown Prince and Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia Mohammed bin Salman Meets with Wang Yi_Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China
snippet: On December 14, 2025 local time, Crown Prince and Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia Mohammed bin Salman met with Member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Riyadh.

title: Jets, chips and a clean slate: Saudi Arabia’s crown prince got almost everything wanted from Trump | CNN
snippet: President Donald Trump, right, responding to a question during Tuesday’s Oval Office bilateral meeting, where Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, left, was asked about the slaying of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi.
